name: Grounded Sim (Chapter 1 Demo)
description:
Controls: WASD for Movement, Space to jump.

Play as a GoAnimate Guy and Collect all 8 Chuck E Cheese Tokens To Escape The Cursed Caillou Woods.

This is The First Game I've ever made, and I spent 4 days on it. it is based off of swamp sim and slendytubbies.

The Caillous are based off of "Go-animate" caillou not "PBS" caillou.

side jumping is your friend here...

Development Server: https://discord.gg/yxSvpXCkA6
